Class RelationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.relation.RelationUtil

  • public final class RelationUtil
extends Object
    Utility functions for handling database relation.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • variances

        public static double[] variances(Relation<? extends NumberVector> database,
                 NumberVector centroid,
                 DBIDs ids)
        Determines the variances in each dimension of the specified objects stored in the given database.
        Parameters:
        database - the database storing the objects
        ids - the ids of the objects
        centroid - the centroid or reference vector of the ids
        Returns:
        the variances in each dimension of the specified objects

      • relationAsMatrix

        public static double[][] relationAsMatrix(Relation<? extends NumberVector> relation,
                          ArrayDBIDs ids)
        Copy a relation into a double matrix. This is not recommended unless you need to modify the data temporarily.
        Parameters:
        relation - Relation
        ids - IDs, with well-defined order (i.e. array)
        Returns:
        Data matrix
